raw akas.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?

Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader? USA (alternative spelling)
akas from release info: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (original title)
Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader? USA (alternative spelling)

1.title: Meet the Kids

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

1.plot: An adult is asked questions ranging from grades 1-5. If they get them all right, they get 1,000,000 dollars.

2.title: Paul/Robin

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

2.plot: Contestants compete for $1 million on this atypical quiz show that tests adults' lack of knowledge, as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. These contestants find themselves in a classroom setting and revisiting their youth as they tackle subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. Players are not alone, however; there is a way for them to "cheat" in this classroom. The adults have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct a-n-s-w-e-r.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

2.plot: As students across the country head back to school, a new class of fifth-graders are introduced on ARE YOU SMARTER THAN A 5TH GRADER?. Supermodel Kathy Ireland and the State Superintendent from Georgia attempt to graduate toward the top prize of $1 million in this atypical quiz show that tests adults' lack of knowledge as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. These notable contestants find themselves in a classroom setting, revisiting their youth, as they tackle subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. Players are ...

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

3.plot: Class is in session with a new quiz show from producer Mark Burnett and host Jeff Foxworthy. Grownups reveal how much they've forgotten since elementary school as they answer math, geography and social studies questions from grade school textbooks and are forced to ask real 5th graders for help when they don't know the correct a-n-s-w-e-r-s.

28.plot: Grownup contestants try to graduate toward the top prize of $1 million in this atypical quiz show that tests adults' lack of knowledge - as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. Adults find themselves in a classroom setting, revisiting their youth, as they tackle subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. Contestants are not alone, however; there is a way for them to "cheat" in this classroom. The adults have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers, who will offer what they think is the correct ...

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

7.plot: The nation's youngest mayor takes center stage as he governs this atypical game show that tests adults' lack of knowledge as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. 8.title: Episode #3.8

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

8.plot: A die-hard Boston Celtics fan takes center stage in attempt to pass and slam-dunk the test on this atypical game show that tests adults' lack of knowledge as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. When the Celtics Dancers make a surprise appearance, concentration will be key as this contestant goes for a perfect score to win the $1 million-dollar goal. Also up for the 5th grader challenge is the reigning Miss Plus America.

9.title: Episode #3.9

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

9.plot: Legendary KISS frontman Gene Simmons jams his way into the classroom for his charity, the Elizabeth Glazer Pediatrics AIDS Foundation. As his family looks on, Gene rocks the test and spirited fans cheer him on this atypical game show that tests adults' lack of knowledge as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school.

10.title: Episode #3.10

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

10.plot: Will TV news reporter Deborah Norville broadcast her skills when she hits the classroom to face an elementary school curriculum for charity? Also featured is three-time NBA champion Rick Fox attempting bring his "A" game to the classroom.

11.plot: After spending some of her television life as a student, Jennie Garth of "Beverly Hills 90210" heads back to the classroom to test her grade-school skills for the American Heart Association.

19.title: Episode #3.19

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

19.plot: Contestants try to graduate toward the top prize of $1 million in this atypical quiz show that tests adults' lack of knowledge - as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. Adults find themselves in a classroom setting, revisiting their youth, as they tackle subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. 20.title: Episode #3.20

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

20.plot: Hot Dog Eating Champion Joey Chestnut competes for $1 million on this atypical quiz show that tests adults' lack of knowledge as revealed by how much they've forgotten since elementary school. Chestnut will answer various questions ranging from art to geography and math to social studies, and if he finds himself in need of some assistance, he will have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct answer.

21.title: Episode #3.21

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

21.plot: Stand-up comedian and co-star of "The Blue Collar Comedy Tour," Larry the Cable Guy competes for $1 million by testing his knowledge in the subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. He is not alone, however; there is a way for him to "cheat" in this classroom. He will have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct answer.

22.title: Episode #3.22

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

22.plot: Television personality Star Jones and animal expert Jack Hanna each compete for $1 million for their charity of choice by testing their elementary school knowledge in the subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. If they are unsure of an answer they will have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct answer.

23.title: Episode #3.23

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

23.plot: Famed boxer Sugar Ray Leonard hooks and jabs his way through the competition to win $1 million for his charity of choice as he tests his smarts in subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. If he doesn't want to get knocked out, he can look to the real grade-schoolers to offer what they think is the correct answer.

24.title: Episode #3.24

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

24.plot: After fighting for their lives, shark attack survivor Bethany Hamilton and coma survivor Jill Finley compete for $1 million by testing their elementary school knowledge in the subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. If they are unsure of an answer they will have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct answer.

25.title: Episode #3.25

episode of.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? (TV Series 2007–2015)

25.plot: Actor Dean Cain competes for $1 million for his favorite charity, The Lollipop Theater Network Inc., by testing his knowledge in elementary school subjects ranging from art to geography and math to social studies. If he is unsure of an answer, he will have the opportunity to get help from real grade-schoolers who will offer what they think is the correct response.

imdb.title: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
plot: A quiz show that features adult contestants and questions directly from the textbooks of first through fifth graders.::Anonymous
